info.title: Finance API
info.description: API for managing personal finance accounts, transactions, and categories

get.description: Retrieve all financial accounts for the authenticated user

put.description: Upsert a financial account with a specific ID

patch.description: Update an existing account by ID

delete.description: Delete an account by ID (including all associated transactions)

get.description: Retrieve transactions for the authenticated user, optionally filtered by account

put.description: Upsert a new transaction with a specific ID

patch.description: Update an existing transaction by ID

get.description: Retrieve all categories for the authenticated user

put.description: Upsert a new transaction category with a specific ID

patch.description: Update an existing category by ID

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's first name and last name
